name: Terra Melior
description:
My name is Ryan Saunders, and I am a full-time solo indie game developer.  Working as a solo developer I require player feedback at every stage of development.  I consider my players as part of my development team.  I hope you will give each build a try and provide feedback and suggestions.  Good or bad, I want to hear from you to help improve the game.  My intention is to continue working on the game while updating the itch.io client until a fully functional and polished demo is available on steam.

Please consider trying my most recent commercial game on steam "Game Dev Masters" or wish listing to show support.  There is a free demo available.
